page.title: 12Filey since 1953.
page.content:
Questionnaire by Susie Johnson. How have employment figures changed since 1953,are they higher or lower?
Employment figures now are higher than ever before and unemployment are also higher than before.
Why are employment figures higher? This is because more married women are getting jobs.
How have schools changed since 1953? They had much more copral punishment in 1953 than today- any teacher could cane you then.
How has housing changed in Filey since 1953? Filey has had over 600 new house since then,although none have been built on the sea-front.
